entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:23 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 12:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of rain. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
